{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Wistron NeWeb |model = USB-400 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = B11 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 1.1 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = NKRUSB400 |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:0B:6B |chip1 = Intersil;ISL3871; |chip2 = Intersil;ISL3684; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/17/2003 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== {{wlanng_hw |nicid=8026 |nic_ver=1.0.0 |pri_id=0015 |pri_ver=1.1.2 |sta_id=001f |sta_ver=1.5.6 }} ===Additional specifications=== These specs are per '''WNC''''s FCC manual. '''Power Consumption:''' *Tx: 250mA max. *Rx: 250mA max. *Power saving mode: 100mA max. '''RF Output Power''': +13 to +17 dBm
'''Multipath Delay:''' 125ns @ 11M, 250ns @ 5.5M {{802dot11 RxSens|11b |info=PER < 0.08 |1M=-90 |2M=-88 |5.5M=-86 |11M=-84 }} [[Category:English Documentation]]
